title: Apple and almond squares
ingredients: ['175g butter, softened', '175g brown sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '100g self raising flour', '100g ground almonds', '1 pinch ground cloves', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '50g mixed dried fruit', '100g flaked almonds', '100g mixed nuts', '2 medium cooking apples, cored and finely chopped']
